item.title: US top doctor calls for cancer warnings on alcohol
item.description: Surgeon General Vivek Murthy says warning labels should be updated to increase awareness of links to seven types of cancer.

item.title: Biden blocks Japan's Nippon Steel from buying US Steel
item.description: Biden decided to scrap the deal despite concerns that it could damage Washington's relations with Tokyo.

item.title: Israel confirms it is holding Gaza hospital chief Abu Safiya
item.description: The IDF had earlier told a local NGO it was unaware of his case, sparking concern.

item.title: Why is it so hard to arrest South Korea's impeached president?
item.description: Yoon Suk Yeol has been impeached by parliament and suspended from office.

item.title: Apple to pay $95m to settle Siri 'listening' lawsuit
item.description: The tech giant denies wrongdoing after being accused of eavesdropping on customers.
